24  bool PotentialFieldControl::init(hardware_interface::EffortJointInterface *robot, ros::NodeHandle &n)
25  {

130  void PotentialFieldControl::starting(const ros::Time& time)
131  {
132  // get joint positions
133  for(unsigned int i=0; i < joint_handles_.size(); i++)
134  {
135  joint_msr_states_.q(i) = joint_handles_[i].getPosition();
136  joint_msr_states_.qdot(i) = joint_handles_[i].getVelocity();
137  joint_des_states_.q(i) = joint_msr_states_.q(i);
138  joint_des_states_.qdot(i) = joint_msr_states_.qdot(i);
139  }
140 
141  I_ = Eigen::Matrix<double,7,7>::Identity(7,7);
142  Force_attractive = Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1>::Zero();
143  Force_repulsive = Eigen::Matrix<double,7,1>::Zero();
144  F_Rep_table = Eigen::Matrix<double,7,1>::Zero();
145  Force_total_rep = Eigen::Matrix<double,7,1>::Zero();
146  Force_repulsive_prev = Eigen::Matrix<double,7,1>::Zero();
147  Force_attractive_last = Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1>::Zero();
148  Force_total_rep_last = Eigen::Matrix<double,7,1>::Zero();
149 
150  Force_repulsive_last = Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1>::Zero();
151 
152  fk_pos_solver_->JntToCart(joint_msr_states_.q,x_des_);
153 
154  first_step_ = 1;
155  error_pose_trajectory.arrived = 0;
156  // switch_trajectory = false;
157  SetToZero(tau_prev_);
158  SetToZero(x_err_integral);
159  }
160 
161  void PotentialFieldControl::update(const ros::Time& time, const ros::Duration& period)
162  {
163  std_msgs::Float64MultiArray tau_msg;
164  std_msgs::Float64MultiArray qdot_msg;
165  std_msgs::Float64MultiArray vel_msg;
166 
167  // get joint positions
168  for(unsigned int i=0; i < joint_handles_.size(); i++)
169  {
170  joint_msr_states_.q(i) = joint_handles_[i].getPosition();
171  joint_msr_states_.qdot(i) = joint_handles_[i].getVelocity();
172  vel_msg.data.push_back(joint_handles_[i].getVelocity());
173  }
174  pub_velocity_.publish(vel_msg);
175  N_trans_ = I_;
176  SetToZero(tau_);
177 
178  //flag to use this code with real robot
179  if (start_flag)
180  {
181  // computing Inertia, Coriolis and Gravity matrices
182  id_solver_->JntToMass(joint_msr_states_.q, M_);
183  id_solver_->JntToCoriolis(joint_msr_states_.q, joint_msr_states_.qdot, C_);
184  id_solver_->JntToGravity(joint_msr_states_.q, G_);
185  G_.data.setZero();
186 
187  JacobiSVD<MatrixXd>::SingularValuesType sing_vals_;
188  // computing the inverse of M_ now, since it will be used often
189  pseudo_inverse(M_.data,M_inv_,sing_vals_,false);
190 
191  // computing Jacobian J(q)
192  jnt_to_jac_solver_->JntToJac(joint_msr_states_.q,J_);
193 
194  // computing the distance from the mid points of the joint ranges as objective function to be minimized
195  phi_ = task_objective_function(joint_msr_states_.q);
196 
197  // using the first step to compute jacobian of the tasks
198  if (first_step_ == 1)
199  {
200  J_last_ = J_;
201  phi_last_ = phi_;
202  first_step_ = 0;
203  return;
204  }
205 
206  // computing the derivative of Jacobian J_dot(q) through numerical differentiation
207  J_dot_.data = (J_.data - J_last_.data)/period.toSec();
208 
209  // computing forward kinematics
210  fk_pos_solver_->JntToCart(joint_msr_states_.q,x_);
211 
212  //calculate jacobian and position keeping track of all joints
213  for(unsigned int i=0; i<kdl_chain_.getNrOfSegments()+1;i++)
214  {
215  KDL::Frame x_test;
216  fk_pos_solver_->JntToCart(joint_msr_states_.q,x_test,i);
217  x_chain.push_back(x_test); //x_chain[1-7 + 14];
218  KDL::Jacobian jac_repulsive;
219  jac_repulsive = KDL::Jacobian(7);
220  jnt_to_jac_solver_->JntToJac (joint_msr_states_.q,jac_repulsive , i);
221  JAC_repulsive.push_back(jac_repulsive);
222  }
223 
224  //interpolate the position and rotation
225  if(error_pose_trajectory.arrived == 1)
226  {
227  x_des_.p = x_now_int.p + interpolatormb(time_inter, T_des)* (x_des_int.p - x_now_int.p);
228 
229  x_des_int.M.GetQuaternion(quat_des_.v(0),quat_des_.v(1),quat_des_.v(2),quat_des_.a);
230  x_now_int.M.GetQuaternion(quat_now.v(0),quat_now.v(1),quat_now.v(2),quat_now.a);
231 
232  tf::Quaternion quat_tf_des_int(quat_des_.v(0),quat_des_.v(1),quat_des_.v(2),quat_des_.a);
233  tf::Quaternion quat_tf_now_int(quat_now.v(0),quat_now.v(1),quat_now.v(2),quat_now.a);
234  quat_tf = (tf::slerp(quat_tf_now_int,quat_tf_des_int,Time)).normalize();
235  tf::quaternionTFToKDL(quat_tf,x_des_.M);
236 
237  KDL::Twist x_err_int; //error total
238 
239  x_err_int = diff(x_, x_des_int);
240  tf::twistKDLToMsg (x_err_int, error_pose_trajectory.error_);
241  time_inter_jerk = time_inter;
242  time_inter = time_inter + period.toSec();
243 
244  // SO3 Time update
245  Time = interpolatormb(time_inter, T_des);
246  }
247 
248  x_dot_ = J_.data*joint_msr_states_.qdot.data;
249  x_err_ = diff(x_,x_des_);
250 
251  //just for publish the error interpolate
252  std_msgs::Float64MultiArray err_msg;
253 
254  for(unsigned int i=0; i<6; i++)
255  {
256  err_msg.data.push_back(x_err_(i));
257  }
258  pub_error_int_.publish(err_msg);
259 
260  //msgs for desperate mind
261  //to decide the pose of the object to be removed
262  tf::poseKDLToMsg (x_, error_pose_trajectory.pose_hand);
263  pub_error_.publish(error_pose_trajectory);
264 
265  std_msgs::Float64MultiArray Fa_msg; //msgs for publish the attractive force
266 
267  //set the limitation of velocity
268  KDL::Vector V_err_(Kp_(0)/Kd_(0)*x_err_.vel.data[0],Kp_(1)/Kd_(1)*x_err_.vel.data[1],Kp_(2)/Kd_(2)*x_err_.vel.data[2]);
269  double v_limited = VelocityLimit(V_err_);
270 
271  //calculate the attractive filed like PID control
272  for(int i = 0; i < Force_attractive.size(); i++)
273  {
274  x_err_integral(i) += x_err_(i)*period.toSec();
275  Force_attractive(i) = -Kd_(i)*(x_dot_(i)) + v_limited*Kp_(i)*x_err_(i) + Ki_(i)*x_err_integral(i);
276  Fa_msg.data.push_back(Force_attractive(i));
277  }
278 
279  //jerk trajectory
280  // if(switch_trajectory == true)
281  // {
282  // Time_traj = interpolatormb_line(time_inter, T_des);
283  // Force_attractive = Force_attractive_last + (Force_attractive - Force_attractive_last) * (10*pow(Time_traj,3) - 15*pow(Time_traj,4) + 6*pow(Time_traj,5));
284  // time_inter = time_inter + period.toSec();
285 
286  // if(Time_traj == 1)
287  // {
288  // switch_trajectory = false;
289  // }
290  // }
291 
292  pub_Fa_.publish(Fa_msg);
293 
294  // computing b = J*M^-1*(c+g) - J_dot*q_dot
295  b_ = J_.data*M_inv_*(C_.data + G_.data) - J_dot_.data*joint_msr_states_.qdot.data;
296 
297  // computing omega = J*M^-1*N^T*J
298  omega_ = J_.data*M_inv_*N_trans_*J_.data.transpose();
299 
300  JacobiSVD<MatrixXd>::SingularValuesType sing_vals_2;
301  // computing lambda = omega^-1
302  pseudo_inverse(omega_,lambda_,sing_vals_2);
303 
304  //if there are obstacles in the scene, calculates the repulsive field
305  if(Object_position.size() > 0)
306  {
307  std::vector<Eigen::Matrix<double,7,1>> vect_rep;
308  std::vector<KDL::Vector> point_of_interesting;
309  std_msgs::Float64MultiArray Fr_msg;
310 
311  //desired link
312  for(unsigned int j=0; j< list_of_link.size(); j++)
313  {
314  point_of_interesting.push_back(x_chain[list_of_link[j]].p );
315  }
316 
317  for(unsigned int i=0; i < Object_position.size();i++)
318  {
319  double influence = Object_radius[i] + treshold_influence;
320 
321  std::pair<Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1>, double> ForceAndIndex;
322  ForceAndIndex = GetRepulsiveForce(point_of_interesting, influence, Object_position[i], Object_radius[i], Object_height[i] );
323 
324  //to plot the f repulsive
325  for(unsigned int i=0; i< ForceAndIndex.first.size(); i++)
326  {
327  Fr_msg.data.push_back( (ForceAndIndex.first)(i));
328  }
329  pub_Fr_.publish(Fr_msg);
330  vect_rep.push_back (JAC_repulsive[list_of_link[ForceAndIndex.second]].data.transpose()* lambda_ * ForceAndIndex.first);
331  }
332 
333  Force_repulsive = Eigen::Matrix<double,7,1>::Zero();
334 
335  // if there are more than one objects
336  for(unsigned int j = 0; j<vect_rep.size(); j++)
337  {
338  Force_repulsive += vect_rep[j];
339  }
340  }
341 
342  // //repulsive with table
343  KDL::Vector Table_position(0,0,0.15); //table position
344  std::vector<double> distance_local_obj;
345 
346  for(unsigned int j=0; j< list_of_link.size(); j++)
347  {
348  distance_local_obj.push_back( -Table_position.z() + x_chain[list_of_link[j]].p.z() ); //considered only the z position
349  }
350 
351  std::pair<Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1>, double> ForceAndIndex_table;
352  ForceAndIndex_table = RepulsiveWithTable(distance_local_obj);
353 
354  F_Rep_table = JAC_repulsive[list_of_link[ForceAndIndex_table.second]].data.transpose()* lambda_ * ForceAndIndex_table.first;
355 
356  Force_total_rep = Force_repulsive + F_Rep_table;
357 
358  // computing nullspace
359  N_trans_ = N_trans_ - J_.data.transpose()*lambda_*J_.data*M_inv_;
360 
361  // finally, computing the torque tau
362  tau_.data = (J_.data.transpose()*lambda_*(Force_attractive ))+ 0.0*Force_total_rep + N_trans_*(Eigen::Matrix<double,7,1>::Identity(7,1)*(phi_ - phi_last_)/(period.toSec()));
363 
364  // saving J_ and phi of the last iteration
365  J_last_ = J_;
366  phi_last_ = phi_;
367 
368  //CONTROLLA SE SERVE ANCORA
369  // for (unsigned int j = 0; j < joint_handles_.size(); j++)
370  // {
371 
372  // tau_(j) = filters::exponentialSmoothing(tau_(j), tau_prev_(j), 0.2);
373  // tau_prev_(j) = tau_(j);
374  // }
375 
376  //torque saturation
377  tau_(0) = (std::abs(tau_(0)) >= 176*percentage ? std::copysign(176*percentage,tau_(0)) : tau_(0));
378  tau_(1) = (std::abs(tau_(1)) >= 176*percentage ? std::copysign(176*percentage,tau_(1)) : tau_(1));
379  tau_(2) = (std::abs(tau_(2)) >= 100*percentage ? std::copysign(100*percentage,tau_(2)): tau_(2));
380  tau_(3) = (std::abs(tau_(3)) >= 100*percentage ? std::copysign(100*percentage,tau_(3)): tau_(3));
381  tau_(4) = (std::abs(tau_(4)) >= 100*percentage ? std::copysign(100*percentage,tau_(4)): tau_(4));
382  tau_(5) = (std::abs(tau_(5)) >= 38*percentage ? std::copysign(38*percentage,tau_(5)): tau_(5));
383  tau_(6) = (std::abs(tau_(6)) >= 38*percentage ? std::copysign(38*percentage,tau_(6)): tau_(6));
384  }
385 
386  // set controls for joints
387  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < joint_handles_.size(); i++)
388  {
389  joint_handles_[i].setCommand(tau_(i));
390  tau_msg.data.push_back(tau_(i));
391  }
392 
393  pub_tau_.publish(tau_msg);
394  x_chain.clear();
395  JAC_repulsive.clear();
396  ros::spinOnce();
397 
398  }
399 
400 
401  void PotentialFieldControl::command(const desperate_housewife::handPoseSingle::ConstPtr& msg)
402  {
403 
404  KDL::Frame frame_des_;
405  tf::poseMsgToKDL(msg->pose, frame_des_);
406 
407  PoseDesiredInterpolation(frame_des_);
408 
409  error_pose_trajectory.arrived = 1;
410 
411  }

415  {
416  start_flag = true;

419  void PotentialFieldControl::InfoGeometry(const desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesArray::ConstPtr& msg)
420  {
421  Object_radius.clear();
422  Object_height.clear();
423  Object_position.clear();
424  // Time_traj_rep = 0;
425  // std::cout<<"msg->geometries.size(): "<<msg->geometries.size()<<std::endl;
426  //get info for calculates objects surface
427  for(unsigned int i=0; i < msg->geometries.size(); i++)
428  {
429  KDL::Frame frame_obj;
430  Object_radius.push_back(msg->geometries[i].info[0]); //radius
431  Object_height.push_back(msg->geometries[i].info[1]); //height
432 
433  tf::poseMsgToKDL(msg->geometries[i].pose, frame_obj);
434  Object_position.push_back(frame_obj);
435  }

437  }

439 
440  void PotentialFieldControl::PoseDesiredInterpolation(KDL::Frame frame_des_)
441  {
442  if(Int == 0)
443  {
444  x_des_int = frame_des_;
445  // x_des_ = x_des_int;
446  fk_pos_solver_->JntToCart(joint_msr_states_.q, x_now_int);
447  Int = 1;
448  Time = 0; //time for slerp interpolation
449  time_inter = 0;
450  SetToZero(x_err_last);
451  }
452 
453  else
454  {
455  //new pose
456  if(!Equal(frame_des_, x_des_int,0.05))
457  {
458  // update desired frame;
459  Force_attractive_last = Force_attractive;
460  x_des_int = frame_des_;
461  // update robot position
462  fk_pos_solver_->JntToCart(joint_msr_states_.q, x_now_int);
463  //time update
464  time_inter = 0;
465  Time = 0;
466  // switch_trajectory = true;
467  x_err_last = x_err_;
468  SetToZero(x_err_integral);
469  }
470  }
471 
472  }
473 
474  double PotentialFieldControl::task_objective_function(KDL::JntArray q)
475  {
476  double sum = 0;
477  double temp;
478  int N = q.data.size();
479 
480  for (int i = 0; i < N; i++)
481  {
482  temp = ((q(i) - joint_limits_.center(i))/(joint_limits_.max(i) - joint_limits_.min(i)));
483  sum += temp*temp;
484  }
485 
486  sum /= 2*N;
487 
488  return -sum;
489  }
490 
491  std::vector<double> PotentialFieldControl::GetMinDistance(std::vector<double> distance_local_obj, double influence )
492  {
493  std::vector<double> DistanceAndIndex;
494  std::vector<double>::iterator result = std::min_element(std::begin(distance_local_obj), std::end(distance_local_obj));
495  int index_dist = std::distance(std::begin(distance_local_obj), result);
496 
497  if(distance_local_obj[index_dist] <= influence)
498  {
499  DistanceAndIndex.push_back(1);
500  DistanceAndIndex.push_back( distance_local_obj[index_dist] ); //min distance
501  DistanceAndIndex.push_back( index_dist); //jacobian index
502  }
503 
504  else
505  DistanceAndIndex.push_back(0);
506 
507  return DistanceAndIndex;
508  }
509 
510  std::pair<Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1>, double> PotentialFieldControl::GetRepulsiveForce(std::vector<KDL::Vector> &point_, double influence, KDL::Frame &Object_pos, double radius, double height)
511  {
512  std::pair<Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1>, double> ForceAndIndex;
513  ForceAndIndex.first = Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1>::Zero();
514  ForceAndIndex.second = 0;
515  std::vector<double> DistanceAndIndex;
516  std::vector<double> distance_local_obj;
517 
518  for(unsigned int k=0; k < point_.size();k++)
519  {
520  distance_local_obj.push_back( (diff(Object_pos.p, point_[k])).Norm());
521  }
522 
523  DistanceAndIndex = GetMinDistance(distance_local_obj, influence);
524 
525  if(DistanceAndIndex[0] == 1 )
526  {
527  Eigen::Vector3d distance_der_partial = GetPartialDerivate(Object_pos, point_[DistanceAndIndex[2]], radius, height);
528  ForceAndIndex.first = GetFIRAS(DistanceAndIndex[1], distance_der_partial, influence);
529  ForceAndIndex.second = DistanceAndIndex[2];
530  }
531 
532  return ForceAndIndex;
533  }
534 
535 
536  Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1> PotentialFieldControl::GetFIRAS(double &min_distance, Eigen::Vector3d &distance_der_partial , double &influence)
537  {
538  double Ni_ = 0.8;
539  Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1> Force = Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1>::Zero();
540 
541  Force(0) = (Ni_/pow(min_distance,2)) * (1.0/min_distance - 1.0/influence) * distance_der_partial[0];
542  Force(1) = (Ni_/pow(min_distance,2)) * (1.0/min_distance - 1.0/influence) * distance_der_partial[1];
543  Force(2) = (Ni_/pow(min_distance,2)) * (1.0/min_distance - 1.0/influence) * distance_der_partial[2];
544  Force(3) = 0;
545  Force(4) = 0;
546  Force(5) = 0;
547 
548  return Force;
549  }
550 
551 
552  Eigen::Vector3d PotentialFieldControl::GetPartialDerivate(KDL::Frame &T_v_o, KDL::Vector &Point_v, double &radius, double &height)
553  {
554  Eigen::Matrix<double,4,4> Tvo_eigen;
555  Tvo_eigen = FromKdlToEigen(T_v_o);
556  Eigen::Vector4d Point_v_eigen(Point_v.x(),Point_v.y(),Point_v.z(),1);
557 
558  Eigen::Vector4d Point_o;
559  Point_o = Tvo_eigen.inverse() * Point_v_eigen;
560 
561  Eigen::Vector4d distance_der_partial(0,0,0,0);
562  // distance_der_partial = x^2/radius + y^2 / radius + 2*(z^2n) /l
563  distance_der_partial[0] = (Point_o[0]*2) / radius ;
564  distance_der_partial[1] = (Point_o[1]*2) / radius ;
565  // distance_der_partial[2] = (std::pow(Point_o[2],7)*16 / height ); //n=4
566  distance_der_partial[2] = (Point_o[2]*4) / height ; //n=1
567  distance_der_partial[3] = 0; //n=1
568 
569  Eigen::Vector3d Der_v;
570  Eigen::Vector4d partial_temp;
571  partial_temp = Tvo_eigen*distance_der_partial;
572  Der_v[0] = partial_temp[0];
573  Der_v[1] = partial_temp[1];
574  Der_v[2] = partial_temp[2];
575 
576  return Der_v;
577  }
578 
579  Eigen::Matrix<double,4,4> FromKdlToEigen(KDL::Frame &T_v_o)
580  {
581  Eigen::Matrix<double,4,4> Tvo_eigen;
582  Tvo_eigen.row(0) << T_v_o.M.data[0], T_v_o.M.data[1],T_v_o.M.data[2], T_v_o.p.x();
583  Tvo_eigen.row(1) << T_v_o.M.data[3], T_v_o.M.data[4],T_v_o.M.data[5], T_v_o.p.y();
584  Tvo_eigen.row(2) << T_v_o.M.data[6], T_v_o.M.data[7],T_v_o.M.data[8], T_v_o.p.z();
585  Tvo_eigen.row(3) << 0,0,0,1;
586  return Tvo_eigen;
587  }
588 
589  std::pair<Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1>, double> PotentialFieldControl::RepulsiveWithTable(std::vector<double> distance_local_obj)
590  {
591 
592  double Rep_inf_table = 0.15;
593  std::vector<double> DistanceAndIndex;
594  DistanceAndIndex = GetMinDistance(distance_local_obj, Rep_inf_table );
595 
596  std::pair<Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1>, double> ForceAndIndex;
597  ForceAndIndex.first = Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1>::Zero();
598  ForceAndIndex.second = 0;
599 
600  if(DistanceAndIndex[0] == 1 )
601  {
602  Eigen::Vector3d distance_der_partial(0,0,1);
603  // std::cout<<"DistanceAndIndex[1]: "<<DistanceAndIndex[1]<<std::endl;
604 
605  ForceAndIndex.first = GetFIRAS(DistanceAndIndex[1], distance_der_partial, Rep_inf_table);
606  ForceAndIndex.second = DistanceAndIndex[2];
607  }
608 
609  // std::cout<<"table: "<<ForceAndIndex.first<<std::endl;
610 
611  return ForceAndIndex;
612  }
613 
614 
615  void PotentialFieldControl::set_gains(const std_msgs::Float64MultiArray::ConstPtr &msg)
616  {
617  if(msg->data.size() == 2*9)
618  {
619  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
620  {
621  Kp_(i) = msg->data[i];
622  Kd_(i) = msg->data[i + 6];
623  Ki_(i) = msg->data[i + 12];
624  std::cout<<"Kp:" << i << " : " << Kp_(i) << std::endl;
625  std::cout<<"Kd:" << i << " : " << Kd_(i) << std::endl;
626  std::cout<<"Ki:" << i << " : " << Ki_(i) << std::endl;
627  }
628  }
629  else
630  ROS_INFO("Number of Joint handles = %lu", joint_handles_.size());
631 
632  ROS_INFO("Num of Joint handles = %lu, dimension of message = %lu", joint_handles_.size(), msg->data.size());
633 
634 
635  }
636 
637 
638  void PotentialFieldControl::SeeMarker(KDL::Frame &Pos, std::string obst_name)
639  {
640  // std::string obst_name= "pose_desired" ;
641  tf::Transform tfGeomTRansform;
642  geometry_msgs::Pose p;
643  p.position.x = Pos.p.x();
644  p.position.y = Pos.p.y();
645  p.position.z = Pos.p.z();
646  Pos.M.GetQuaternion(p.orientation.x, p.orientation.y ,p.orientation.z ,p.orientation.w);
647  // p.orientation.x = 0;
648  // p.orientation.y = 0;
649  // p.orientation.z = 0;
650  // p.orientation.w = 1;
651  tf::poseMsgToTF( p, tfGeomTRansform );
652  // tf::poseMsgToKDL(p, frames);
653  tf_geometriesTransformations_.sendTransform( tf::StampedTransform( tfGeomTRansform, ros::Time::now(), "vito_anchor", obst_name.c_str()) );
654  }
655 
656 
657 
658 
659  double PotentialFieldControl::VelocityLimit(KDL::Vector &x_dot_d)
660  {
661  double v_limited;
662  Eigen::Vector3d x_dot_eigen(x_dot_d.data[0],x_dot_d.data[1],x_dot_d.data[2]);
663  double temp = V_max_kuka/ std::sqrt(x_dot_eigen.transpose()*x_dot_eigen);
664  v_limited = std::min(1.0, temp);
665 
666  // std::cout<<"v_limited: "<<v_limited<<std::endl;
667  return v_limited;
668  }
669 
670 
671 }
